<p class=box>
[TCNTU](#tcntu-tcntp) = total particle counts per sample interval, UHSAS  
[TCNTP](#tcntu-tcntp) = total particle counts per sample interval, PCASP  
$\Delta t$ = sample
interval [s]  
[USFLWC](#pflw) = corrected sample flow rate, UHSAS [cm$^{3}$s$^{-1}$]  
[PFLWC](#pflw) = corrected sample flow rate, PCASP [cm$^{3}$s$^{-1}$]  
</p><p class=box2>
\begin{equation}
\mathrm{\{CONCU\}}=\frac{\mathrm{\{TCNTU\}}}{\mathrm{\{USFLWC\}}\Delta t}
(\#eq:CONCUbox1)
\end{equation}
\begin{equation}
\mathrm{\{CONCP\}}=\frac{\mathrm{\{TCNTP\}}}{\mathrm{\{PFLWC\}}\Delta t}
(\#eq:CONCUbox2)
\end{equation}
</p>
